quote: Hazaaron khwahishein aisi, ke har khwahish pe dam nikle; bahut nikle mere armaan, lekin phir bhi kam nikle.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Na tha kuch to Khuda tha, kuch na hota to Khuda hota; Duboya mujhko hone ne, na hota main to kya hota.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Dil hi to hai na sang-o-khisht, dard se bhar na aaye kyon; Royenge hum hazaar baar, koi humein sataaye kyon.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Baazicha-e-atfaal hai duniya mere aage, hota hai shab-o-roz tamaasha mere aage.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Gulon mein rang bhare, baad-e-naubahar chale; Chale bhi aao ke gulshan ka karobar chale.
author: Faiz Ahmed Faiz

quote: Mujh se pehli si muhabbat mere mehboob na maang.
author: Faiz Ahmed Faiz

quote: Bol ke lab azaad hain tere, bol zaban ab tak teri hai; Tera sutwan jism hai tera, bol ke jaan ab tak teri hai.
author: Faiz Ahmed Faiz

quote: Khudi ko kar buland itna ke har taqdeer se pehle, Khuda bande se khud pooche, bata teri raza kya hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Sitaron se aage jahan aur bhi hain, abhi ishq ke imtihan aur bhi hain.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Hazaaron saal nargis apni benooree pe roti hai, bohat mushkil se hota hai chaman mein deedawar paida.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Patta patta, boota boota, haal hamara jaane hai; Jaane na jaane gul hi na jaane, bagh to saara jaane.
author: Meer Taqi Meer

quote: Ranjish hi sahi dil hi dukhane ke liye aa; Aa phir se mujhe chhod ke jaane ke liye aa.
author: Ahmad Faraz

quote: Jis tarah khwab mere rezah rezah ho gaye, is tarah se na kabhi toot kar bikhrein koi.
author: Parveen Shakir

quote: Ab to is raah se woh shakhs guzarta bhi nahin, ab kis umeed pe darwaze se jhankay koi.
author: Parveen Shakir

quote: Jo guzaari na jaa saki hum se, hum ne woh zindagi guzari hai.
author: Jaun Elia

quote: Har aadmi mein hotey hain das bis aadmi, jis ko bhi dekhna ho to, kai baar dekhna.
author: Nida Fazli

quote: Koshish bhi kar, ummeed bhi rakh, rasta bhi chun; Phir iske baad thoda muqaddar talash kar.
author: Nida Fazli

quote: Kabhi kisi ko mukammal jahan nahin milta, kahin zameen kahin aasman nahin milta.
author: Nida Fazli

quote: Bachon ke chhote haathon ko chaand sitaare chhoone do, chaar kitaben padh kar yeh bhi hum jaise ho jaenge.
author: Nida Fazli

quote: Ghar se masjid hai bohat door, chalo yun kar lein; Kisi rote hue bachche ko hansaya jae.
author: Nida Fazli

quote: Putar! dard woh hota hai jo hamein doosron ko takleef mein dekh kar mehsoos ho; warna apna dard to janwaron ko bhi mehsoos hota hai.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Lab pe aati hai dua ban ke tamanna meri, Zindagi shama ki surat ho Khudaya meri.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Yeh na thi hamari qismat ke visaal-e-yaar hota, Agar aur jeete rahte yahi intezaar hota.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Main akela hi chala tha jaanib-e-manzil magar, log saath aate gaye aur karwan banta gaya.
author: Majrooh Sultanpuri

quote: Dil na-umeed to nahin, nakaam hi to hai; Lambi hai gham ki sham magar sham hi to hai.
author: Faiz Ahmed Faiz

quote: Ranj se khugar hua insaan to mit jaata hai ranj, Mushkilein mujh par padin itni ke aasan ho gayin.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Hum ko mita sake yeh zamane mein dam nahin, Hum se zamana khud hai zamane se hum nahin.
author: Jigar Moradabadi

quote: Kashtiyan sab ki kinare pe pahunch jaati hain, Na-Khuda jin ka nahin, unka Khuda hota hai.
author: Ameer Minai

quote: Tere maathe pe yeh aanchal bohat hi khoob hai lekin, tu is aanchal se ek parcham bana leti to achha tha.
author: Asrarul Haq Majaz

quote: Chala jata hun hansta khelta mauj-e-hawadis se, Agar aasaniyan hon to zindagi dushwar ho jae.
author: Asghar Gondvi

quote: Mere junoon ka natija zaroor niklega, isi siyah samandar se noor niklega.
author: Ameer Qazalbash

quote: Apna zamana aap banate hain ahl-e-dil, hum woh nahin ke jin ko zamana bana gaya.
author: Jigar Moradabadi

quote: Hayat le ke chalo kainaat le ke chalo, chalo to saare zamane ko saath le ke chalo.
author: Makhdoom Mohiuddin

quote: Bade duniya mein raho ghamzada ya shad raho, Aisa kuchh kar ke chalo yaan ki bahut yaad raho.
author: Meer Taqi Meer

quote: Raat ko jeet to pata nahin lekin yeh chiragh, Kam se kam raat ka nuqsan bahut karta hai.
author: Irfan Siddiqi

quote: Pyaso raho na dasht mein barish ke muntazir, Maro zameen pe pan ki pani nikal pade.
author: Iqbal Sajid

quote: Yeh kah ke dil ne mere hausle badhae hain, ghamon ki dhoop ke aage khushi ke saaye hain.
author: Mahirul Qadri

quote: Badh ke toofan ko aaghosh mein le le apni, Dubne wale tere haath se sahil to gaya.
author: Abdul Hamid Adam

quote: Aansuon ki bhi apni ek zubaan hoti hai, kabhi khushi mein behte hain, kabhi gham mein chhup jaate hain.
author: Unknown

quote: Main us se is liye milta hoon ki us se milne ka sabab na rahe.
author: Jaun Elia

quote: Kuch log aise milte hain, jo sirf yaadon mein hi ache lagte hain.
author: Unknown

quote: Har ek baat pe kehte ho tum ke tu kya hai; tumhi kaho ke yeh andaaz-e-guftagu kya hai.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Kya us bewafa se dil laga baithe; jo waqt ke saath saath badal gaya.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi se yahi gila hai mujhe; tu bahut der se mila hai mujhe.
author: Ahmad Faraz

quote: Dard itna tha ke dil chup raha; farz tha ya ke koi silsila chup raha.
author: Unknown

quote: Jis ko chaha use pa na sake; aur jo paaya use chaha na gaya.
author: Unknown

quote: Mohabbat kisi se karna asaan hai; par use nibhaana mushkil.
author: Unknown

quote: Woh humsafar tha magar us se hum-nawaayi na thi.
author: Naseer Turabi

quote: Jo guzar jaati hai woh manzil nahin hoti; manzil wahi hai jo saath chalti rahe.
author: Unknown

quote: Tanhai mein jeene ka maza kuch aur hai; bheed mein toh insaan gum ho jaata hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Yeh ishq nahi aasan, itna hi samajh lijiye; ek aag ka dariya hai, aur doob ke jaana hai.
author: Jigar Moradabadi

quote: Kuch is tarah teri palkain meri palkon se mila de; aansu tere saare meri palkon pe sajaa de.
author: Parveen Shakir

quote: Jab tak tohda na jaaye, rishta mazboot hota hai; jab toot jaaye, toh sirf yaadein reh jaati hain.
author: Unknown

quote: Waqt sab kuch bhula deta hai, magar sach kabhi nahi badalta.
author: Unknown

quote: Umeed woh chiraagh hai jo andheron mein bhi roshni deta hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Rishte bharose se bante hain, shart se nahi.
author: Unknown

quote: Zakhm dene wale bhool jaate hain; lekin zakhm khud ko kabhi nahi bhoolta.
author: Unknown

quote: Main akela hi chala tha janib-e-manzil magar; log saath aate gaye aur kaarwaan banta gaya.
author: Majrooh Sultanpuri

quote: Kuch to majbooriyan rahi hongi; yun koi bewafa nahi hota.
author: Ahmad Faraz

quote: Logon ka kya hai, woh to keh dete hain; lekin dard sirf khud hi mehsoos hota hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Mohabbat mein nahi hai farq jeene aur marne ka; usi ko dekh kar jeete hain jis kaafir pe dum nikle.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Har kisi ke naseeb mein kahan hoti hai mohabbat; kuch log duniya mein sirf chahne ke liye hote hain.
author: Unknown

quote: Tere jaane ka asar kuch aisa hua mujh par; tujhe dhoondhte dhoondhte main khud ko bhool gaya.
author: Unknown

quote: Jitni khoobsurat soch hoti hai, utna hi behtareen rishta banta hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Khush rehne ka raaz yeh hai ke jo chala gaya uska shukr aur jo mila uska shukr.
author: Unknown

quote: Har rishtey mein bharosa zaroori hota hai, warna tanhaayi toh ek pal mein mil jaati hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Aaj ik aur baras beet gaya us ke baghair, jis ke hote hue hote the zamane mere.
author: Ahmad Faraz

quote: Mana ki teri deed ke qabil nahin hoon main, tu mera shauq dekh mera intezaar dekh.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Aur bhi dukh hain zamane mein mohabbat ke siva, raahatein aur bhi hain wasl ki rahat ke siva.
author: Faiz Ahmed Faiz

quote: Hum ko maloom hai jannat ki haqiqat lekin, dil ke khush rakhne ko 'Ghalib' ye khayal achha hai.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Main akela hi chala tha jaanib-e-manzil magar, log saath aate gaye aur carvaan banta gaya.
author: Majrooh Sultanpuri

quote: Hum aah bhi karte hain to ho jaate hain badnaam, woh qatl bhi karte hain to charcha nahin hota.
author: Akbar Allahabadi

quote: Khudi ko kar buland itna ki har taqdeer se pehle, Khuda bande se khud pooche bata teri raza kya hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Ishq ne 'Ghalib' nikamma kar diya, warna hum bhi aadmi the kaam ke.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Un ke dekhe se jo aa jaati hai munh par raunaq, woh samajhte hain ki bimar ka haal achchha hai.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Ye ishq nahin aasan itna hi samajh lijiye, ik aag ka dariya hai aur doob ke jaana hai.
author: Jigar Moradabadi

quote: Ragon mein daudte phirne ke hum nahin qail, jab aankh hi se na tapka to phir lahu kya hai.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Sitaron se aage jahan aur bhi hain, abhi ishq ke imtihan aur bhi hain.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Hazaaron khwahishein aisi ki har khwahish pe dam nikle, bahut nikle mere armaan lekin phir bhi kam nikle.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Zahid sharab peene de masjid mein baith kar, ya woh jagah bata de jahan par Khuda na ho.
author: Unknown

quote: Ye jabr bhi dekha hai tareekh ki nazron ne, lamhon ne khata ki thi sadiyon ne saza pai.
author: Muzaffar Razmi

quote: Woh aaye ghar mein hamare Khuda ki qudrat hai, kabhi hum un ko kabhi apne ghar ko dekhte hain.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Zindagi zinda-dili ka hai naam, murda-dil khaak jiya karte hain.
author: Imam Bakhsh Nasikh

quote: Hum ko mita sake ye zamane mein dam nahin, hum se zamana khud hai zamane se hum nahin.
author: Jigar Moradabadi

quote: Ab to utni bhi mayassar nahin mai-khane mein, jitni hum chhod diya karte the paimane mein.
author: Diwakar Rahi

quote: Kabhi kisi ko mukammal jahan nahin milta, kahin zameen kahin aasman nahin milta.
author: Nida Fazli

quote: Ab to jaate hain but-kade se 'Meer', phir milenge agar Khuda laya.
author: Meer Taqi Meer

quote: Ranjish hi sahi dil hi dukhane ke liye aa, aa phir se mujhe chhod ke jaane ke liye aa.
author: Ahmad Faraz

quote: Tu idhar udhar ki na baat kar ye bata ki qaafile kyun lute, teri rahbari ka sawal hai hamein rahzan se gharaz nahin.
author: Shahab Jafri

quote: Umr-e-daraaz maang ke laai thi chaar din, do aarzoo mein kat gaye do intezaar mein.
author: Seemab Akbarabadi

quote: Ranjish hi sahi dil hi dukhane ke liye aa, aa phir se mujhe chhod ke jaane ke liye aa.
author: Ahmad Faraz
